code: import Swal from"sweetalert2";import{RemoveTodo}from"../../redux/state/todoSlice";import store from"../../redux/store/store";export function DeleteAlart(i){Swal.fire({title:'Are you sure?',text:"You won't be able to revert this!",icon:'warning',showCancelButton:true,confirmButtonColor:'#3085d6',cancelButtonColor:'#d33',confirmButtonText:'Yes, delete it!'}).then(result=>{if(result.isConfirmed){store.dispatch(RemoveTodo(i));}});}
